import { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; export default function StudentTable(){ const [students,setStudents]=useState(""); const DisplayDetails=(id)=> useEffect(()=>{ fetch('http://localhost:8000/students') .then((res)=>res.json()) .then((data)=> setStudents(data)).catch((err)=> console.log(err.message)) },[]) return(

Student Records

Add new Student { students && students.map((item)=>() ) }
ID Name Place Mobile Actions
{item.id} {item.name} {item.place} {item.mobile} Edit Delete
) }
